channel.title: Israel National Radio - Tamar Yonah
channel.description:
Tamar Yonah is the daughter of a Holocaust survivor. Her father survived the Nazi brutalities and after liberation, made his way to the shores of the British Palestine Mandate, where again fighting for his survival, fought in Israel's war of Independence. This made a great impression on her life and she too has been fighting for Israel by serving in the Israeli army & air force, and afterwards by becoming an activist for Israel and the Jewish nation. She has been a vocal beacon of light since beginning a prolific career in radio. She hosts The Tamar Yonah Show - Israel's most popular English language radio talk show. She also writes a biting and sometimes humorous, award winning blog that discusses current events, religion and politics. www.israelnationalnews.com/Blogs/Blog.aspx/3#
You can email Tamar at: Tamar@IsraelNationalRadio.com

image.title: Israel National Radio - Tamar Yonah
image.description: A neo-Zionist perspective on Israel and the Jewish World.

item.title: To Destroy, or Not to Destroy. That is the Question.
item.description: News & Call-In with Tamar Yonah PM Netanyahu pleaded with Likud lawmakers to oppose the 'regulation law' saying it would harm Israel's settlements. Really?
item.itunes:subtitle: PM Netanyahu pleaded with Likud lawmakers to oppose the 'regulation law' saying it would harm Israel's settlements. Really?

item.title: SMASH & CRACK! + LIVE report from the Hunger Striking Tent!
item.description:
The Tamar Yonah Show

SMASH & CRACK! What is it like to be the target of a fierce rock attack by Arabs? A survivor tells all.
item.itunes:subtitle: SMASH & CRACK! What is it like to be the target of a fierce rock attack by Arabs? A survivor tells all.

item.title: Hidden Nazis in the USA. Why?
item.description:
News & Call-In with Tamar Yonah

item.title: As the World Turns
item.description:
News & Call-In with Tamar Yonah

Death Threats in Turkey, Scandals in the Vatican, Harassment in Saudi Arabia, And Obama Chooses Appeasement for Cheap Oil.

item.title: Liberalism and Islam: A Marriage of Convenience?

News & Call-In with Tamar Yonah

How do Liberalism and Islam make a happy marriage, when its values are diametrically opposed?

item.title: Whistle-Blower on Washington's Dirty Secrets
item.description:
The Tamar Yonah Show

Former Washington D.C. lobbyist, Jack Abramoff, was convicted for fraud. He is now a whistle-blower!
